disp-quote.p: 4) In the Discussion, it would be important to emphasize that the metastabilty of the endemic regime is a result of the specific assumptions of this model and to discuss potential biological effects that alter the phase diagram. In particular, much work has been devoted to discuss mechanisms that stabilize the TW regime, e.g. the ideas of short-term broad cross-immunity (Ferguson et al., 2003) or random fitness components (Tria et al., 2005).
